> Kup walked towards the entrace
>
> "How's Rodimus?"

Legacy had just landed by the time Kup had made his way to the
entrance, and so for a long moment Santon, Legacy and Bump appeared to
ignore Kup as they examined him carefully as they could through the
concealing strands of metal cables that covered him.

Finally Santon looked back at kup, "We're not sure yet. He scans as
healthy and sleeping, but these cables have snaked their way through
many of his vital systems."

Bump doesn't even turn from his observation as he spoke, "Fortunately
these cables are inert and are making no effort to stop us. I get the
feeling that they were once connected in some way to some sort of
being."

Santon spun back to look at Rodimus, "What?!?" He ran his scanner over
Rodimus again, "You're right." he said as he sighed, "I'm afraid to
know what Rodimus went through down there."

Legacy, who was still carrying Rodimus looked over at Kup, "Rodimus
has been through an ordeal, but I believe it is within our power to
repair him, however it will take some time."

Santon and Bump both nodded their agreement. Santon looked up at
Legacy as both he and Bump backed away slightly, "We will need your
complete report on whatever it was that did this."

Legacy nodded as he started to walk further in the entrance and
towards the medical bay, Santon and Bump both following him.

Silverbolt who had come to stand next to Kyp, looked at Rodimus his
optics dim and thoughtful, "He was a hero Kup, even if he had fallen
into the trap of a black hearted villain." He turned to look at Kup,
"He will pull through, that's what heroes do."

(TAG)

Preston
